search.overview: Kirakira 星球上生活着两个部落：Senobi 和 Robot。塞诺比（Senobi）安静祥和，在森林中生存。 机器人（Robot）来自沙漠，为了控制绿地而发动战争。来自塞诺比的年轻英雄试图安抚整个局势……
search.name: 宇宙泰山

search.original_name: La vuelta al mundo de Willy Fog
search.overview: Around the World with Willy Fog is a cartoon adaptation of Around the World in Eighty Days by Jules Verne. The cartoon was produced by Spanish studio BRB Internacional with animation by Japanese studio Nippon Animation. In the same vein as BRB's Dogtanian and the Three Muskehounds, the characters are anthropomorphisms of various animals as the species depicted are of much greater variety than in that series. The core trio are all felines being pursued by three canine foes. Willy Fog is depicted as a lion, while Rigodon is actually a cat and not a lynx because of his tail and ears and Romy a panther.
search.name: Around the World With Willy Fog
